pr_title: Fixed sifter mesh buy option for creative mode.

timeline.message: Fixed sifter mesh buy option for creative mode. Also fixed the color setting of the labels.

timeline.bodyText:
This is correct, however i just noticed that we don't check that the player (if in survival) has the item in their inventory on server side. As such this is exploitable (free upgrades) by a client using a bad version of the mod.
Can you please add a check up the top of this method to return if the player doesn't have the required item in their inventory (or ignore if in creative)
Thanks
